name: Heartex, Inc.
description: Developer of data labeling software designed to manage training data in one place. The company's software helps to add management and annotator capabilities to facilitate and optimize collaborative data labeling, quality assurance and analytics, enabling businesses to annotate their datasets quickly and achieve accurate and competitive machine learning /artificial intelligence models at scale.
one_liner: Developer of data labeling software designed to manage training data in one place. The company's software helps to add management and annotator capabilities to facilitate and optimize collaborative data labeling, quality assurance and analytics, enabling businesses to annotate their datasets quickly and achieve accurate and competitive machine learning /artificial intelligence models at scale.
